Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Feat: Assessment flow improvements and PDF download

Assessment Flow:
- URL parameter ?tier= now works, skips tier selection
- Lead capture form before quiz \(email required\)
- Email auto-fills on results page from saved data
- Results page spacing fix \(badge not hidden by header\)

PDF Download:
- Added "Download PDF" button for AI Implementation Strategy
- Uses html2pdf.js for client-side PDF generation
- Includes full strategy with proper A4 formatting

Bug Fixes:
- Fixed framer-motion card flashing \(ScaleIn uses variants now\)
- Specific CSS transitions instead of transition-all
- Added Suspense boundary for useSearchParams \(Next.js 15\)
